activities: Pathway Forensics may in the course of daily business for our client company have personal data provided to us for processing, if that data resides on client company servers , pc's, or other electronic devices.

recoursemech: Pathway Forensics has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Pathway Forensics, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
